title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.233 - Removal from covered function
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.233 - Removal from covered function

State Regulations

Except as provided in sections 262.239 through
262.243
of this Part, no operator
shall permit any covered employee to perform covered functions if the employee
has engaged in conduct prohibited by sections 262.215 through
262.223
of this Part or an alcohol
misuse rule of another DOT agency. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
262.233

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
